title.value: CARIN RTPBC Patient Pay Category Code System

description.value: This code system defines components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

definition.value: Amount to be collected from a patient to be applied to a periodic deductible.
Amount to be collected from a patient to satisfy a per prescription coinsurance.
Amount to be collected from the patient to satisfy a per prescription copay.
Amount to be collected from the patient for sales tax.
Other amount to be collected from the patient (PLACEHOLDER DURING IG DEVELOPMENT).
Amount equalling the total patient responsibility for a prescription product's cost.
